name: Export Invoice Ninja invoices to Google Sheets as new rows
description: Every time a new invoice is created on Invoice Ninja, Make will add it to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses a table created according to [this example](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1OBOm6KFOumLEtaw8OdYFHGKinZqB1obF9dn0MedSeTQ/edit?usp=sharing).
